newsitem.title: UK: USA Global Link to float this year - UK newspaper.
newsitem.headline: USA Global Link to float this year - UK newspaper.

text.p: USA Global Link, the U.S.-based callback group poised to offer cut-price worldwide phone services via the Internet, plans to float this year, a British newspaper reported on Monday.
According to its principal officers, the initial public offering could value the company at $3.0 billion to $6.0 billion, the Financial Times said.
Merrill Lynch said it had been retained as adviser but it was not yet known on which stock market the offering would be made, the newspaper reported.
USA Global Link said last month it was in strategic alliance talks with up to 30 international companies.
